title: Ask Novation: What Do You Want To Know About The Novation Circuit?
text: Leslie : My thoughts exactly hellspawn : What's the best way to use Circuit with CV gear? I'd like to use it to… pg evens : Why don't your mobile apps talk to Circuit? They cover similar territory, so it seems like a lost opportunity to… BE : Are there any plans to add the ability to pan things? Wilson : I also want to know what is a good alternative to modstep. I have it and am not in love.… davethevet : So whats a good alternative to modstep? Will : My thoughts as well. Modstep seems to have finally really stablized AU support but when I think of all of… Nerk_ : Hi Erik, you can do that: just long-tap on a Clip or a Track to rename it and then tap… Korg Gadget Release Delayed (14) Juan : The Feedback was really poor jm0101101 : I don't think you're the only one willing to pay $199 ....but I think plenty of us have already paid… Tags Ableton Ableton Live ambient music analog analog synthesizer Apple audio effects DAW demo video demo videos DJ drum machine Eurorack Free Music Software guitar history of electronic music iPad iPad Music Software iPhone iPhone music software Keyboard Synthesizers Korg live performance MIDI MIDI Controllers modular synthesizer modular synthesizers Moog Moog-music Music Videos Native Instruments Roland sample library software synthesizer software synthesizers strange musical instruments Sunday Synth Jam synth synth DIY synthesizer Synthesizers synth jam synth porn Virtual Instruments Windows Copyright © 2004-2017 Synthtopia, All Rights Reserved This website uses cookies to improve your experience.
